author: Lydia Smith
title: Michigan Coronavirus Lockdown: New Details As Stay-At-Home Order Extended to April 30 By Gov. Whitmer
description: The executive order imposes more stringent limitations on stores to reduce foot traffic. More than 21,500 cases of COVID-19 have been confirmed in the state of Michigan as of Thursday.
content:
Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer has announced she is extending the "Stay Home, Stay Safe" executive order through to April 30.
The executive order limits gatherings and travel and requires all workers who are not necessary to sustain or protect life to stay h… [+5904 chars]
